input_text:
Job Title: Solutions Architect

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Finance, Information Technology

Description:
LTIMindtree is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity in the workplace. Our employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth or related medical conditions), gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, age, family-care status, veteran status, marital status, civil union status, domestic partnership status, military service, handicap or disability or history of handicap or disability, genetic information, atypical hereditary cellular or blood trait, union affiliation, affectional or sexual orientation or preference, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law, except where such considerations are bona fide occupational qualifications permitted by law.A little about us...
Role: Solution ArchitectLocation: Atlanta, GA
 Job Description:  Leads top-down enterprise design focusing on the business model, digital transformation, and innovation.Operates with a business viewpoint and works closely with LOB and Engineering directors creating required IT landscape. Performs problem tracking, diagnosis, root cause analysis, replication of faults, troubleshooting, and resolution for highly complex issues.Expertise in leading and implementing Cloud native solutions – API and Web applications, DevOps, and Infrastructure as Code. Minimum 10 years of architecture/design/delivery experience, which includes 5 years of Azure cloud platform development and design for IaaS, PaaS, Cloud Networking, APIM, VPN, Front door, Appservices and Gateways Hands on experience with Azure services, ADF, Data bricks, Synapse, SQL servers .Net, Angular, Micro frontend and Azure DevopsAuthors standard procedures, technology, SDLC, collaboration, cloud and other IT servicesAbility to see the program end to end , create milestones around MVPs and deliverables and execute programs working with business, technology, and program management groups.Strong Analytical and broad architectural skillsInsurance domain experience preferred.
LTIMindtree is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity in the workplace. Our employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth or related medical conditions), gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, age, family-care status, veteran status, marital status, civil union status, domestic partnership status, military service, handicap or disability or history of handicap or disability, genetic information, atypical hereditary cellular or blood trait, union affiliation, affectional or sexual orientation or preference, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law, except where such considerations are bona fide occupational qualifications permitted by law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Solutions Architect
job_responsibilities: Leads top-down enterprise design focusing on the business model, digital transformation, and innovation.
Works closely with LOB and Engineering directors creating required IT landscape.
Performs problem tracking, diagnosis, root cause analysis, replication of faults, troubleshooting, and resolution for highly complex issues.
Expertise in leading and implementing Cloud native solutions – API and Web applications, DevOps, and Infrastructure as Code.
